description.ko: 날카로운 기하학적 정밀함과 디지털 오류 및 픽셀 파편화의 혼돈스러운 아름다움이 만나는 KURO-X 브랜드의 최첨단 시각적 탐색입니다.
description.en: A cutting-edge visual exploration of the KURO-X brand, where sharp geometric precision meets the chaotic beauty of digital errors and pixel fragmentation.

prompt: Abstract KURO-X conceptual art, geometric glitch aesthetic, fractured 3D polygons and minimalist shapes, digital distortion effects, chromatic aberration, RGB shift, scanlines, high-contrast black background with neon cyan and magenta accents, sharp edges, tech-noir atmosphere, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, vector-inspired textures.
